thread.section_title: Melia Paris La Defense - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Courbevoie, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Super Convenient!!
thread.title_full: Super Convenient!! - Review of Melia Paris La Defense, Courbevoie, France - TripAdvisor

author: LeeAnn602015
title: Super Convenient!!
text: If you are on a business trip this is the place to stay! In the heart of business district- Metro just outside the main entrance- rooms are brand new, super clean, and the buffet breakfast is outstanding. However , I do know of people that after a long day of speaking all day to co workers and long business hours - you just want to order in room service and watch a movie and just vegg in front of TV . Well 60 stations of every language possible of news can be seen on TV and that's it - NO movie station - No Netflix- Nothing ...but to some this is not important, also if you need information about the city -the staff at front desk is not helpful as they tell you this is a business district-HELLO !! This is your city not mine - There is a shopping center 1 metro station further- but nothing in immediate area . But again hotel itself is nice ..
